title: I have riot kayle, but i can not figure out what skin i got
body:
So I got the message from riot saying "10 years, etc.. and you've been given a summoner icon and a mystery gift" but it didn't mention which one.

I went through all my champs to see if there is any change, but I can't see anything new. Maybe I just can't find it.

Can someone help me, please.
Thank you!

replies.body: Gifts are being sent out seperately, so you haven't received it yet.  There are a lot of accounts to cover so it will be a bit, but you can stay updated through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight until roll outs are done!
